entry.title: Time for a haircut in Turkey
entry.content: Having a haircut abroad is always a bit intimidating. We don't even know if we'll be understood. This time I had my haircut in Turkey and decided to record this experience to show what is special about it.

entry.title: Will you wait until it's too late?
entry.content:
Based on the picture by Ranjith kumar, released as Creative Commons.

Sometimes people ask me: what do you fear the most?

I answer: to be caught in some kind of irreversible life-changing event and realize that I had everything and I didn't use my time wisely, until it's too late. Watch the video to understand.

entry.title: Celebrating three years of Casal Partiu
entry.content: We're celebrating our third anniversary on the road on December 30th 2013. We made this video to share our story: how it all began, where we've been to, what we've learned, what kind of difficulties we faced and what we think about living like nomads.
